name: Candlelight (eryth)
description:
First game i've ever made. Made during first sem of uni with a team of 5.

Collect fire to ignite your candle. Enemies are only visible inside the circle of the candlelight.

You die if you get hurt too much or your candlelight runs out

Collect special flames to use special abilities.

WASD to Move

Space to Jump and Double Jump

X to Dash with Green Flame

Z to Fire Flame
